articles.title: Vice-Captain Shubman Gill To Miss IND vs SL 3rd T20I Due To Neck Spasm Aggravates: Reports - OneCricket
articles.description: In what comes a shocking news, India's vice-captain Shubman Gill is likely to miss the India versus Sri Lanka 3rd T20I. As per the reports, it has been said that a call will be taken on whether or not Gill will be a part of the game.
